1.title: Painting Music with Monet Cherise
1.plot: Joe James intimately sits down with Monet Cherise and talks about her life, loves of music and her upcoming world tour.

locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: The Entertainer Spotlight show is a show that brings you your favorite artists in a way that is upfront and personal. The show's hosts Joe James and Adrain Washington interview fascinating entertainers from all areas of entertainment such as Film, Music, Theater, Television, Art, and Sports. Its a show you the audience can have strong participation in.
imdb.title: Entertainer Spotlight

production companies.name: No Deals With The Devil Filmworks

distributors.name: No Deals With The Devil Filmworks
